programme.title: Tiny Cinema
programme.desc: A twisted tale of seemingly unconnected strangers caught in a series of bizarre and otherworldly events.

programme.title: Drifter
programme.desc: Four characters wake in a desert, disoriented and lost with no clue where they are or how they got there. All four have fresh surgical scars and are on the verge of death.

programme.title: Lake Alice
programme.desc: The Thomas family goes out to their cabin in the woods to celebrate Christimas together with their daughter and her boyfriend, but their first Christmas together may be their last.

programme.title: Last Rampage
programme.desc: The true crime thriller which follows convicted murderers Gary Tison and Randy Greenawalt’s escape from a Arizona State Prison and their murderous rampage through the southwestern desert in the summer of 1978.

programme.title: Black Site
programme.desc: An elite military unit encounters a supernatural entity, known as The Elder Gods, that forces them into battle against an army from another world.

programme.title: Exit 0
programme.desc: A couple sets out on a weekend getaway in hopes of mending their relationship. However, things quickly turn dark when they discover a videotape chronicling the events of a murder in their current hotel room from years before.

programme.title: The Golem
programme.desc: During an outbreak of a deadly plague, a mystical woman must save her tight-knit Jewish community from foreign invaders, but the entity she conjures to protect them is a far greater evil.

programme.title: Drifter
programme.desc: Four characters wake in a desert, disoriented and lost with no clue where they are or how they got there. All four have fresh surgical scars and are on the verge of death.

programme.title: Lake Alice
programme.desc: The Thomas family goes out to their cabin in the woods to celebrate Christimas together with their daughter and her boyfriend, but their first Christmas together may be their last.

programme.title: Chronic Horror
programme.desc: Chronic Horror is a short form interview series that crosses the streams of the worlds of horror filmmaking, horror fandom, and cannabis culture. Join our host Josh Millican, a cannabis and horror expert who takes you on a ride full of laughs and enlightenment.

programme.title: Last Rampage
programme.desc: The true crime thriller which follows convicted murderers Gary Tison and Randy Greenawalt’s escape from a Arizona State Prison and their murderous rampage through the southwestern desert in the summer of 1978.

programme.title: Black Site
programme.desc: An elite military unit encounters a supernatural entity, known as The Elder Gods, that forces them into battle against an army from another world.

programme.title: Exit 0
programme.desc: A couple sets out on a weekend getaway in hopes of mending their relationship. However, things quickly turn dark when they discover a videotape chronicling the events of a murder in their current hotel room from years before.

programme.title: The Golem
programme.desc: During an outbreak of a deadly plague, a mystical woman must save her tight-knit Jewish community from foreign invaders, but the entity she conjures to protect them is a far greater evil.

programme.title: Island Escape
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries embarks on a rescue mission to an island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Trapped, they begin to question their concept of time and space as they learn of supernatural creatures living in the shadows.

programme.title: Butchers
programme.desc: 1998. After the death of their mother, brothers Owen and Oswald Watson are two vicious men left to their own bloody devices in the backcountry. Their twisted fetishes and lust for violence blossom when strangers wander into their dark realm and soon the cleavers are chopping up fresh meat for the wretched flesh-eating creature, they've got locked up with them.
